segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is turning into a soggy nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water gushing everywhere, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is gross, spreading like a stain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, her shoe wet, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around, probably tracking it all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy in the cookie jarâ€”hands all sticky, contaminating the whole batch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's reaching up, begging for a share of that mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting, adding to the sloppy instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, just waiting to get splashed and ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the garden outside can't redeem this indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how unaware they all seem to the disaster building.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my skin crawl with the uncleanliness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off that faucet before it's a total swamp in here.
segments.speaker: PAR
